definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Hey, Mr. Lucas, guess what? Prequels don't have to suck.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，Lucas先生，知道麼，前傳不一定會很爛。

sentences.english: Over-fitting in feedforward multilayer neural network was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對多層前傳網絡的過擬合問題進行了探討。

sentences.english: The prequel tells the most legendary story in Shibumi's life.
sentences.chinese: 火雲邪神最傳奇的一段人生歷程，盡收錄在前傳之中。

sentences.english: I like 'Smallville. ' I don't get the chance to watch a lot of TV because I'm busy a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡超人前傳，我沒有太多機會看電視，我太忙了。

definition: to tell others (a secret)/to divulge to an outsider/to be rumored
unofficial biography (as opposed to official dynastic biography)
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
